SEARCH

Package edu.aau.g404.core

package edu.aau.g404.core
Provides core classes for defining automations, actions and trigger in the IoT system.

This package contains essential classes for creating and managing automations, actions and triggers in the IoT system. It includes the Automation class, the base classes for actions and triggers and their specific implementations.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.aau.g404
    Root package.
    edu.aau.g404.core.action
    Provides classes for representing different actions in the IoT system.
    edu.aau.g404.core.trigger
    Provides classes for representing different triggers in the IoT system.
    edu.aau.g404.api
    Provides classes and interfaces for interacting with various smart device APIs.
    edu.aau.g404.device
    Provides interfaces for representing smart devices in the IoT system.
    edu.aau.g404.protocol
    Provides classes for various communication protocols used for communication with IoT systems.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Automation
    Automation class represents a system to manage and execute a series of actions based on a series of triggers for various light controllers.
